Returns: the current value of the encoding property.
getEncoding().Description: Returns the current value of the encoding property.

Locator2Impl(org.xml.sax.Locator).Description: Copy an existing Locator or Locator2 object. If the object implements Locator2, values of the encoding and versionstrings are copied, otherwise they set to null.

Locator2Impl().Description: Construct a new, empty Locator2Impl object. This will not normally be useful, since the main purpose of this class is to make a snapshot of an existing Locator.

setXMLVersion(java.lang.String).Description: Assigns the current value of the version property.

ClassDesc: SAX2 extension helper for holding additional Entity information, implementing the @B_org#xml#sax#ext#Locator2_E@ interface. This is not part of core-only SAX2 distributions.
